title: 02/08/20 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/08/20 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the Super Bowl matchup between the Bucs and the Chiefs. NBC's Chris Simms discusses who he thinks should have won the games MVP. NBCSN Boston's Tom Curran calls to share what the reaction in New England has been to Brady's 7th Super Bowl. And We look at the Bucs chances to keep this core together with Rick Stroud of the Tampa Times.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
